00037     [Serializable]
00038     public class SampleList :
00039         ICloneable,
00040         ICollection,
00041         IDictionary,
00042         IEnumerable
00043     {
00044         int _size;
00045         int[] _sampleCount; // for mean calculation
00046         double[] _sampleT;
00047         double[] _sampleX;
00048 
00049         SampleList.KeyList _keyList;
00050         SampleList.ValueList _valueList;
00051 
00055         public event EventHandler<SampleAlteredEventArgs> SampleAltered;
00056 
00057         #region Construction
00058 
00062         public
00063         SampleList()
00064         {
00065             _sampleCount = new int[16];
00066             _sampleT = new double[16];
00067             _sampleX = new double[16];
00068         }
00069 
00074         public
00075         SampleList(
00076             int capacity
00077             )
00078         {
00079             if(capacity < 0)
00080             {
00081                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("capacity", Resources.ArgumentNotNegative);
00082             }
00083 
00084             _sampleCount = new int[capacity];
00085             _sampleT = new double[capacity];
00086             _sampleX = new double[capacity];
00087         }
00088 
00092         public
00093         SampleList(
00094             IDictionary d
00095             )
00096             : this((d != null) ? d.Count : 16)
00097         {
00098             if(null == d)
00099             {
00100                 throw new ArgumentNullException("d");
00101             }
00102 
00103             d.Keys.CopyTo(_sampleT, 0);
00104             d.Values.CopyTo(_sampleX, 0);
00105             Array.Sort(_sampleT, _sampleX);
00106             _size = d.Count;
00107         }
00108 
00112         public
00113         SampleList(
00114             IDictionary d, int capacity
00115             )
00116             : this((d != null) ? (capacity >= d.Count ? capacity : d.Count) : 16)
00117         {
00118             if(null == d)
00119             {
00120                 throw new ArgumentNullException("d");
00121             }
00122 
00123             d.Keys.CopyTo(_sampleT, 0);
00124             d.Values.CopyTo(_sampleX, 0);
00125             Array.Sort(_sampleT, _sampleX);
00126             _size = d.Count;
00127         }
00128 
00135         public
00136         SampleList(
00137             IList<double> t,
00138             IList<double> x
00139             )
00140             : this((t != null) ? t.Count : 0)
00141         {
00142             if(null == t)
00143             {
00144                 throw new ArgumentNullException("t");
00145             }
00146 
00147             if(null == x)
00148             {
00149                 throw new ArgumentNullException("x");
00150             }
00151 
00152             if(t.Count != x.Count)
00153             {
00154                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("x");
00155             }
00156 
00157             t.CopyTo(_sampleT, 0);
00158             x.CopyTo(_sampleX, 0);
00159             Array.Sort(_sampleT, _sampleX);
00160             _size = t.Count;
00161         }
00162 
00163         #endregion
00164 
00165         #region Items
00166 
00170         void
00171         EnsureCapacity(
00172             int min
00173             )
00174         {
00175             int capacitySuggestion = (_sampleCount.Length < 8) ? 16 : (_sampleCount.Length << 1);
00176             this.Capacity = (capacitySuggestion < min) ? min : capacitySuggestion;
00177         }
00178 
00182         void
00183         AppendMean(
00184             int index,
00185             double x
00186             )
00187         {
00188             double cntBefore = _sampleCount[index];
00189             double cntAfter = _sampleCount[index] = _sampleCount[index] + 1;
00190             _sampleX[index] = (_sampleX[index] * cntBefore + x) / cntAfter;
00191 
00192             if(SampleAltered != null)
00193             {
00194                 SampleAltered(this, new SampleAlteredEventArgs(_sampleT[index]));
00195             }
00196         }
00197 
00201         void
00202         Insert(
00203             int index,
00204             double t,
00205             double x
00206             )
00207         {
00208             if(_size == _sampleCount.Length)
00209             {
00210                 EnsureCapacity(_size + 1);
00211             }
00212 
00213             if(index < _size)
00214             {
00215                 Array.Copy(_sampleCount, index, _sampleCount, index + 1, _size - index);
00216                 Array.Copy(_sampleT, index, _sampleT, index + 1, _size - index);
00217                 Array.Copy(_sampleX, index, _sampleX, index + 1, _size - index);
00218             }
00219 
00220             _sampleCount[index] = 1;
00221             _sampleT[index] = t;
00222             _sampleX[index] = x;
00223             _size++;
00224 
00225             if(SampleAltered != null)
00226             {
00227                 SampleAltered(this, new SampleAlteredEventArgs(t));
00228             }
00229         }
00230 
00236         public virtual
00237         void
00238         Add(
00239             double t,
00240             double x
00241             )
00242         {
00243             int index = Locate(t);
00244             if(index > 0 && Number.AlmostEqual(_sampleT[index], t))
00245             {
00246                 AppendMean(index, x);
00247             }
00248             else if(index < _sampleT.Length - 1 && Number.AlmostEqual(_sampleT[index + 1], t))
00249             {
00250                 AppendMean(index + 1, x);
00251             }
00252             else
00253             {
00254                 Insert(index + 1, t, x);
00255             }
00256         }
00257 
00261         public virtual
00262         void
00263         RemoveAt(
00264             int index
00265             )
00266         {
00267             double t = _sampleT[index];
00268 
00269             if(index < 0 || index >= _size)
00270             {
00271                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("index");
00272             }
00273 
00274             _size--;
00275             if(index < _size)
00276             {
00277                 Array.Copy(_sampleCount, index + 1, _sampleCount, index, _size - index);
00278                 Array.Copy(_sampleT, index + 1, _sampleT, index, _size - index);
00279                 Array.Copy(_sampleX, index + 1, _sampleX, index, _size - index);
00280             }
00281 
00282             _sampleCount[_size] = 0;
00283 
00284             if(SampleAltered != null)
00285             {
00286                 SampleAltered(this, new SampleAlteredEventArgs(t));
00287             }
00288         }
00289 
00293         public virtual
00294         void
00295         Remove(
00296             double t
00297             )
00298         {
00299             int index = IndexOfT(t);
00300             if(index >= 0)
00301             {
00302                 RemoveAt(index);
00303             }
00304         }
00305 
00309         public virtual
00310         void
00311         Clear()
00312         {
00313             _size = 0;
00314 
00315             if(SampleAltered != null)
00316             {
00317                 SampleAltered(this, new SampleAlteredEventArgs(double.NaN));
00318             }
00319         }
00320 
00324         int
00325         IndexOfT(
00326             double t
00327             )
00328         {
00329             int index = Locate(t);
00330             if(Number.AlmostEqual(_sampleT[index], t))
00331             {
00332                 return index;
00333             }
00334 
00335             if(Number.AlmostEqual(_sampleT[index + 1], t))
00336             {
00337                 return index + 1;
00338             }
00339 
00340             return -1;
00341         }
00342 
00346         int
00347         IndexOfX(
00348             double x
00349             )
00350         {
00351             return Array.IndexOf(_sampleX, x, 0, _size);
00352         }
00353 
00358         void
00359         SetX(
00360             double t,
00361             double x
00362             )
00363         {
00364             int index = Locate(t);
00365             if(Number.AlmostEqual(_sampleT[index], t))
00366             {
00367                 _sampleX[index] = x;
00368                 _sampleCount[index] = 1;
00369             }
00370             else if(Number.AlmostEqual(_sampleT[index + 1], t))
00371             {
00372                 _sampleX[index + 1] = x;
00373                 _sampleCount[index + 1] = 1;
00374             }
00375             else
00376             {
00377                 Insert(index + 1, t, x);
00378             }
00379         }
00380

00392         public double MaxT
00393         {
00394             get { return _sampleT[_size - 1]; }
00395         }

00412         public
00413         double
00414         GetX(
00415             int index

00417         {
00418             return _sampleX[index];
00419         }

00423         #region Search
00424 
00429         public
00430         int
00431         Locate(
00432             double t
00433             )
00434         {
00435             return LocateBisection(t, -1, _size);
00436         }
00437 
00443         public
00444         int
00445         Locate(
00446             double t,
00447             int nearIndex
00448             )
00449         {
00450             if(nearIndex < 0 || nearIndex > _size - 1)
00451             {
00452                 return LocateBisection(t, -1, _size);
00453             }
00454 
00455             int lower = nearIndex;
00456             int upper;
00457             int increment = 1;
00458 
00459             if(t >= _sampleT[lower]) 
00460             {
00461                 // Hunt Up
00462 
00463                 if(lower == _size - 1)
00464                 {
00465                     return lower;
00466                 }
00467 
00468                 upper = lower + 1;
00469                 while(t >= _sampleT[upper])
00470                 {
00471                     lower = upper;
00472                     increment <<= 1;
00473                     upper = lower + increment;
00474 
00475                     if(upper > _size - 1)
00476                     {
00477                         upper = _size;
00478                         break;
00479                     }
00480                 }
00481             }
00482             else 
00483             {
00484                 // Hunt Down
00485 
00486                 if(lower == 0)
00487                 {
00488                     return -1;
00489                 }
00490 
00491                 upper = lower--;
00492                 while(t < _sampleT[lower])
00493                 {
00494                     upper = lower;
00495                     increment <<= 1;
00496 
00497                     if(increment > upper)
00498                     {
00499                         lower = -1;
00500                         break;
00501                     }
00502                     else
00503                     {
00504                         lower = upper - increment;
00505                     }
00506                 }
00507             }
00508 
00509             return LocateBisection(t, lower, upper);
00510         }
00511 
00515         int
00516         LocateBisection(
00517             double t,
00518             int lowerIndex,
00519             int upperIndex
00520             )
00521         {
00522             int midpointIndex;
00523 
00524             while(upperIndex - lowerIndex > 1)
00525             {
00526                 midpointIndex = (upperIndex + lowerIndex) >> 1;
00527 
00528                 if(t >= _sampleT[midpointIndex])
00529                 {
00530                     lowerIndex = midpointIndex;
00531                 }
00532                 else
00533                 {
00534                     upperIndex = midpointIndex;
00535                 }
00536             }
00537 
00538             if(_size > 0 && Number.AlmostEqual(t, _sampleT[_size - 1]))
00539             {
00540                 return _size - 2;
00541             }
00542 
00543             return lowerIndex;
00544         }
00545

00548         #region Properties
00549 
00553         public int Capacity
00554         {
00555             get
00556             {
00557                 return _sampleCount.Length;
00558             }
00559 
00560             set
00561             {
00562                 if(value != _sampleCount.Length)
00563                 {
00564                     if(value < _size)
00565                     {
00566                         throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("value");
00567                     }
00568 
00569                     if(value > 0)
00570                     {
00571                         int[] sampleCountNew = new int[value];
00572                         double[] sampleTNew = new double[value];
00573                         double[] sampleXNew = new double[value];
00574 
00575                         if(_size > 0)
00576                         {
00577                             Array.Copy(_sampleCount, 0, sampleCountNew, 0, _size);
00578                             Array.Copy(_sampleT, 0, sampleTNew, 0, _size);
00579                             Array.Copy(_sampleX, 0, sampleXNew, 0, _size);
00580                         }
00581 
00582                         _sampleCount = sampleCountNew;
00583                         _sampleT = sampleTNew;
00584                         _sampleX = sampleXNew;
00585                     }
00586                     else
00587                     {
00588                         _sampleCount = new int[16];
00589                         _sampleT = new double[16];
00590                         _sampleX = new double[16];
00591                     }
00592                 }
00593             }
00594         }
00595 
00596         #endregion

00608 
00612         public virtual
00613         SampleList
00614         Clone()
00615         {
00616             SampleList list = new SampleList(_size);
00617             Array.Copy(_sampleCount, 0, list._sampleCount, 0, _size);
00618             Array.Copy(_sampleT, 0, list._sampleT, 0, _size);
00619             Array.Copy(_sampleX, 0, list._sampleX, 0, _size);
00620             list._size = _size;
00621             return list;
00622         }

00645 
00646         void
00647         ICollection.CopyTo(
00648             Array array,
00649             int index
00650             )
00651         {
00652             if(array == null || array.Rank != 1)
00653             {
00654                 throw new ArgumentException("array", Resources.ArgumentSingleDimensionArray);
00655             }
00656 
00657             if(index < 0 || (array.Length - index) < _size)
00658             {
00659                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("index");
00660             }
00661 
00662             for(int i = 0; i < _size; i++)
00663             {
00664                 DictionaryEntry entry = new DictionaryEntry(_sampleT[i], _sampleX[i]);
00665                 array.SetValue(entry, i + index);
00666             }
00667         }

00683         object IDictionary.this[object key]
00684         {
00685             get
00686             {
00687                 int index = this.IndexOfT(Convert.ToDouble(key));
00688                 if(index >= 0)
00689                 {
00690                     return this._sampleX[index];
00691                 }
00692 
00693                 return null;
00694             }
00695 
00696             set
00697             {
00698                 if(key == null)
00699                 {
00700                     throw new ArgumentNullException("key");
00701                 }
00702 
00703                 double dkey = Convert.ToDouble(key);
00704                 double dvalue = Convert.ToDouble(value);
00705                 SetX(dkey, dvalue);
00706             }
00707         }

00980         [Serializable]
00981         private sealed class SampleListEnumerator : IDictionaryEnumerator, IEnumerator, ICloneable
00982         {
00983             private bool current;
00984             private int endIndex;
00985             private EnumerationMode mode;
00986             private int index;
00987             private object key;
00988             private SampleList sampleList;
00989             private int startIndex;
00990             private object value;
00991 
00992             internal enum EnumerationMode : int
00993             {
00995                 Keys = 0,
00996 
00998                 Values = 1,
00999 
01001                 DictEntry = 2
01002             }
01003 
01004             internal SampleListEnumerator(SampleList sampleList, int index, int count, EnumerationMode mode)
01005             {
01006                 this.sampleList = sampleList;
01007                 this.index = index;
01008                 this.startIndex = index;
01009                 this.endIndex = index + count;
01010                 this.mode = mode;
01011             }
01012 
01013             public object Clone()
01014             {
01015                 return MemberwiseClone();
01016             }
01017 
01018             public bool MoveNext()
01019             {
01020                 if(this.index < this.endIndex)
01021                 {
01022                     this.key = sampleList._sampleT[this.index];
01023                     this.value = sampleList._sampleX[this.index];
01024                     this.index++;
01025                     this.current = true;
01026                     return true;
01027                 }
01028 
01029                 this.key = null;
01030                 this.value = null;
01031                 this.current = false;
01032                 return false;
01033             }
01034 
01035             public void Reset()
01036             {
01037                 this.index = this.startIndex;
01038                 this.current = false;
01039                 this.key = null;
01040                 this.value = null;
01041             }
01042 
01043             public object Current
01044             {
01045                 get
01046                 {
01047                     if(!this.current)
01048                     {
01049                         throw new InvalidOperationException();
01050                     }
01051 
01052                     if(this.mode == EnumerationMode.Keys)
01053                     {
01054                         return this.key;
01055                     }
01056 
01057                     if(this.mode == EnumerationMode.Values)
01058                     {
01059                         return this.value;
01060                     }
01061 
01062                     return new DictionaryEntry(this.key, this.value);
01063                 }
01064             }
01065 
01066             public DictionaryEntry Entry
01067             {
01068                 get
01069                 {
01070                     if(!this.current)
01071                     {
01072                         throw new InvalidOperationException();
01073                     }
01074 
01075                     return new DictionaryEntry(this.key, this.value);
01076                 }
01077             }
01078 
01079             public object Key
01080             {
01081                 get
01082                 {
01083                     if(!this.current)
01084                     {
01085                         throw new InvalidOperationException();
01086                     }
01087 
01088                     return this.key;
01089                 }
01090             }
01091 
01092             public object Value
01093             {
01094                 get
01095                 {
01096                     if(!this.current)
01097                     {
01098                         throw new InvalidOperationException();
01099                     }
01100 
01101                     return this.value;
01102                 }
01103             }
01104         }
